content:
I'm getting a 

Submitting Usage Stats failed: Connection timed out: connect

not sure if there's anything behind it, just informing
usually means there is a problem with my server
I'll look at it once I land

I am running into the same problem now. But it appears strange to me:
I have 2 different IGs on two machines. So 4 combinations. On my old machine both are running thru. On my new machine only one. So it is not a server issue, and probably not depending on the IG. The identified differences are:
Java 11.0.10 instead of 1.8.0
Gem 3.1.4 instead of 3.0.3
Any ideas? thx
Maybe the error message is showing up due to timeout although the error is in the generation process of Jekyll?
not unlikely. Are the machines the same type? (Windows, unix)?

Should be identical. I updated the software to have the same version. Again problems on one machine. In the meantime the error disappeared due to updates on the source material. Nevertheless I do not understand the differences. Anyhow...
BTW, any ideas for "attribute path isn't defined"? I suppose it's an XSLT error...
